name: Purple Noise Echo
detailed_description:
Purple Noise Echo is a dark neon atmospheric tactical game in which you play Node, a silicon entity who start from nothing in a singular place where everything has to be discovered and understand.

It's a low pace game were you have to use your brain, not a gun!


No past, no memory, no identity.
Start form nothing and discover what you can do along the way. Explore to understand the environment, and perhaps yourself.


Move tiles up or down, unlock doors, create ways.


Alone, you’re weak. Surround yourself with entities, Control them, give them skills. Are they allies our just tools?


The path isn't straight and simple. Find how to get through the levels.


Some will try to stop you and ressources are limited. Think twice and use non-lethal strategies to make your way through.
